DeleteTerminology.name: DeleteTerminology
DeleteTerminology.description: A synchronous action that deletes a custom terminology.

DescribeTextTranslationJob.name: DescribeTextTranslationJob
DescribeTextTranslationJob.description:
Gets the properties associated with an asynchronous batch translation job including
                                                name, ID, status, source and target languages, input/output S3 buckets, and so on.

ImportTerminology.name: ImportTerminology
ImportTerminology.description:
Creates or updates a custom terminology, depending on whether or not one already exists
                                                for the given terminology name.

ListTerminologies.name: ListTerminologies
ListTerminologies.description: Provides a list of custom terminologies associated with your account.

ListTextTranslationJobs.name: ListTextTranslationJobs
ListTextTranslationJobs.description: Gets a list of the batch translation jobs that you have submitted.

StartTextTranslationJob.name: StartTextTranslationJob
StartTextTranslationJob.description:
Starts an asynchronous batch translation job. Batch translation jobs can be used to
                                                translate large volumes of text across multiple documents at once.

StopTextTranslationJob.name: StopTextTranslationJob
StopTextTranslationJob.description: Stops an asynchronous batch translation job that is in progress.

TranslateText.name: TranslateText
TranslateText.description: Translate text from a source language to a target language.
